document_notes.text:
This update for bind fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-25220: Fixed a DNS cache poisoning vulnerability due to loose
  caching rules (bsc#1197135).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: BIND 9.11.0 -> 9.11.36 9.12.0 -> 9.16.26 9.17.0 -> 9.18.0 BIND Supported Preview Editions: 9.11.4-S1 -> 9.11.36-S1 9.16.8-S1 -> 9.16.26-S1 Versions of BIND 9 earlier than those shown - back to 9.1.0, including Supported Preview Editions - are also believed to be affected but have not been tested as they are EOL. The cache could become poisoned with incorrect records leading to queries being made to the wrong servers, which might also result in false information being returned to clients.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
